page.title: 07WISTON"PIECES OF EIGHT"C.E.
page.content: There is a group in Wiston called "Pieces of Eight."There are seven children in the group and the leader Simon Morris. He plays the flute,the piano and he sings.Everyone in the group sings.In addition I play the cello,Ainsley plays the chime bars,Anna and Karen play the recorders and Alice and Nicola play the violins.Bryony played the recorder but she has moved away so Linda will be taking her place. We have practices every Friday at quarter past four.We practice different pieces of music for about two hours.While some of us are playing the verse,the others play the chorus. We are invited to sing at clubs and old peoples homes. Each performance consists of about twelve pieces of music. THE END.
